text: Divorce Coupons is a 1922 American silent drama film directed by Webster Campbell and starring Corinne Griffith, Holmes Herbert and Cyril Ring.Munden p.191 ==Cast== * Corinne Griffith as Linda Catherton * Holmes Herbert as Roland Bland * Mona Lisa as Ishtar Lane * Diana Allen as Teddy Beaudine * Cyril Ring as Conrad Fontaine * Vincent Coleman as Buddy ==References== ==Bibliography== * Munden, Kenneth White. The American Film Institute Catalog of Motion Pictures Produced in the United States, Part 1. University of California Press, 1997. ==External links== * Category:1922 films Category:1922 drama films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:Films directed by Webster Campbell Category:American silent feature films Category:English-language films Category:Vitagraph Studios films Category:American black-and-white films
title: Divorce Coupons
